1.name: Assassin
1.description: Stealths and annihilators. With his knowledge of ambushes, the assassin seeks to kill his victim with illusions, even before he realizes that his end has come!

2.name: Hunter
2.description: Hunters use long-range weapons to take down their enemies. Wolves are your best friends, and your best battle supporters.

3.name: Reaper
3.description: Reaper will be a class divided into 3 subclasses. A dark assassin who needs souls to continue wandering the lands without having to go back to where they left off, hell.

4.name: Warrior
4.description: Nothing better in battle than the balance between damage and armor. That's exactly what the Warrior is, a machine to deal damage while persevering.

5.name: Illusionists
5.description: Illusionists are sorcerers who have focused their studies on deceiving the enemy. Destroy your enemies by killing both your physical and your mental

6.name: Paladin
6.description: Knowledgeable in the spiritual arts, paladins seek to withstand all the damage of battle while harnessing sacred abilities to save their people.

1.name: Elf
1.description: Elves are nature's best friends. They have a great affinity with this element, not to mention their easily noticeable physical features, such as their ears

2.name: Goblin
2.description: They are professionals when it comes to stealing. Your knowledge helps you find items that no one could find, especially in human remains

3.name: Human
3.description: Firefinders, through their discovery and continued use, learned every part of the invocations, creating a high affinity for the element.

4.name: Orc
4.description: Monsters that have insight into what is right and wrong and, therefore, are accepted in society. Due to their tough meat, they are stronger in terms of not taking damage

5.name: Chained
5.description: Cursed humans. In the past, after committing heavy crimes, dragons cursed a large part of humanity, turning them into chains. As they are directly linked to black magic, they have a high affinity with the dark element

6.name: Saint
6.description: Blessed humans. They always studied the arts of light, being the closest race to a dragon possible. Due to their studies, they have a high affinity with the Light element.
